arts.ttl: Dynamo Kyiv vs Crystal Palace – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Crystal Palace will make their historic debut in a major European group stage competition on Thursday when they travel to Poland to face Ukrainian champions Dynamo Kyiv. Oliver Glasner’s side are in sensational form, currently on an 18-match unbeaten run across all competitions. arts.ttl: Dynamo Kyiv vs Crystal Palace predictions: Eagles can grind out opening win
arts.sum: Dynamo Kyiv face Crystal Palace on Thursday and James Milton expects the Conference League favourite Eagles to make a winning start in Poland.
